data.text:
New York: Popular Library, 1989.

No Flaws or Blemishes but minimal shelf handling; Appears unread. SIGNED with an inscription by the author on the title page. First Printing.

Fine / No Dust Jacket As Issued. Item #18288

ISBN: 0445209526

Nicos Bando--an unrehabilitable twenty-seven-year-old convict serving time in the year 2115--finds his sentence "commuted" and himself sent to a harsh exile on the planet Doldra.

Author Background Information:

Hugo, Nebula, and Campbell Award winner, Barry Longyear is author of Enemy Mine, made into a major motion picture by Fox. Recent works include The Enemy Papers and Yesterday's Tomorrow. Having completed training as a P.I., he has entered the world of mystery writing with The Hangman's Son. He lives with his wife, Jean, in New Sharon, Maine.
